name: Warden
description:
Play as a Warden, the sole protector of a small village from sadistic entities that come from the Mist.

Warden is a simulation role-playing game most easily described as "The Witcher meets Stardew Valley."

Warden is currently in the early stages of development by three guys. Wishlist and Follow us for periodic updates, including Beta testing oppurtunities.

Experience Daily Life


  • Manage energy and needs, including hunger, health, warmth, and cleanliness
  • Gather resources via chopping, hauling, farming, foraging and hunting
  • Upgrade the homestead in hundreds of ways
  • Spend hard earned gold and socialize in the village

Guard Against Evils from the Mist


  • Every village needs a Warden to survive
  • Keep the pyre lit atop your Tower so other Wardens know you haven't yet met your fate
  • Patrol the border of the Mist daily, looking for traces of something coming out
  • Do what you've been trained to do since childhood: hunt and defeat these monstrosities

Hunting and Combat


  • Research habits and tell-tales of the creatures you hunt
  • Listen and Look for signs in the wilderness
  • Keep your sword sharp and your skills sharper
  • Mentally spar with your prey before taking it on

The Village


  • Build trust, safety, and love
  • Participate in festivals and events
  • Pay villagers to help you with various tasks
  • Try not to let anyone die...

Features


  • Day / Night cycle with volumetric sunlight
  • Changing seasons
  • Weather changes day to day
  • Grow a beard over time
